# README Generator

  # ![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-Apache_2.0-blue.svg) 

  ## Description 
  ### Creates a README file using node commands

  ## Table of Contents:
  * [Installation](#installation)
  * [Tests](#tests)
  * [Usage](#usage)
  * [License](#license)
  * [Contributions](#contributing)
  * [Questions](#questions)

  ## Installation
  ### npm i

  ## Tests
  ### npm test

  ## Usage
  ### Run node index.js to start application
